sentences.en: A biodegradable mobile phone was, this month , introduced by scientists.
A term that refers to products that are biodegradable.
sentences.cn: 可生物降解的产品的特点.

sentences.en: Biodegradable poly ( L - aspartic acid ) hydrogels were synthesized by a two step cross - linking reaction.
sentences.cn: 采用两步交联法合成了可生物降解聚天冬氨酸水凝胶.

sentences.en: In practice this is not the case since part of the sludge is not biodegradable.
sentences.cn: 实际上不是这样,因为有一部分污泥不能为生物所降鲜.

sentences.en: Poly - lactide is one of the generally acknowledged biodegradable macromolecular materials.
sentences.cn: 聚丙 交酯 是世界公认的可体内降解的高分子材料之一.

sentences.en: Polyesteramide copolymer is a newly developed biodegradable high - molecular material.
sentences.cn: 聚酯酰胺是一种新开发的可生物降解的高分子聚合材料.

sentences.en: Preparation of biodegradable PELA microspheres and optimization of the technology are reported.
sentences.cn: 本文报道了可生物降解的PELA微球的优化工艺,制得平均球径为32.μ,平均包封率为75%上,临界相对湿度约78%及流动性好的白色球形粉末.

sentences.en: Sarcosinate that is a raw material for biodegradable formulas is found.
sentences.cn: 找到了一种可生物降解的配方原材料——肌氨酸盐.

sentences.en: Starch - based biodegradable plastics is a kind of important degradable polymer material.
sentences.cn: 淀粉基生物降解塑料是一种重要的可降解高分子材料.

sentences.en: Study immunological adjuvant function of biodegradable microspheres for DNA immunization.
sentences.cn: 探讨生物可降解微球对基因免疫的增强作用.

sentences.en: That car was said to be 95 percent recyclable or biodegradable.
sentences.cn: 据说这辆车95%的部分可以回收并且可以生物降解.

sentences.en: The company had falsely claimed that its products were biodegradable.
sentences.cn: 公司谎称他们的产品是可生物降解的.

sentences.en: The rap oil - based lubricative additive is biodegradable and environment receivable lubricant.
sentences.cn: 菜籽油基添加剂是一种可生物降解的环保的润滑剂.

sentences.en: The wastewater oleoresin processing is acidic, and contains concentrated non biodegradable pollutants.
sentences.cn: 松脂加工废水呈酸性,污染物浓度高, 生物难降解.

sentences.en: These issues may be averted by biodegradable stents, the authors maintain.
sentences.cn: 作者认为生物降解支架可以防止这些问题.

sentences.en: This carton is made of biodegradable plastic.
sentences.cn: 这盒子是用生物降解塑料做的。

trans.tran_cn: 能进行生物降解的，能起生物递解分解作用的
trans.tran_en: materials, chemicals etc that are biodegradable are changed naturally by  bacteria  into substances that do not harm the environment
